value.title: Starcraft 2: EASY Beginner Protoss Build Order Tutorial vs Terran [2021]
value.excerpt: Very powerful protoss build order vs terran. value.title: Starcraft2: Protoss Build Order Guide (Dark Templars @ 4:25!)
value.excerpt: In today's Starcraft 2 guide/lesson we are looking at a very powerful protoss vs zerg build order. We drop dark templars at 4:24 and at the same time harass another bases drones with 3 adepts. Very difficult for zerg to defend. value.title: How to deal with LADDER ANXIETY in StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I get asked "How do I beat Ladder Anxiety" all the time so I made a video which hopefully answers a lot of people's questions!
